data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Sara will have a baby soon. To ____ ready, she ____ has a lot ____ do. She ____ go ____ the ____ next ____ and ____ baby ____ and ____ shampoo. She ____ plans ____ buying ____ toys ____ her ____ child. She is very excited!
data.partBlankContent: Sara will have a baby soon. To b_ ready, she st___ has a lot t_ do. She wi__ go t_ the st___ next we__ and b__ baby clo____ and ba__ shampoo. She al__ plans o_ buying so__ toys f__ her n__ child. She is very excited!
data.fullContent: Sara will have a baby soon. To be ready, she still has a lot to do. She will go to the store next week and buy baby clothes and baby shampoo. She also plans on buying some toys for her new child. She is very excited!
data.answer: 萨拉很快就要生孩子了。为了做好准备，她还有很多事情要做。她下周要去商店买婴儿衣服和婴儿洗发露。她还计划给她的新孩子买一些玩具。她非常兴奋!
